text: Write code as if it were accompanied by a violent psychopath who knows where you live
author: Steve Mcconell

text: The complexity of the program grows until it exceeds the ability of the programmer.
author: Arthur Bloch, Murphy's Law

text: It's very easy to walk on water and develop programs according to the ToR... if they are frozen
author: Napoleon Hill

text: Strive not for success, but for the values ​​it gives
author: Albert Einstein

text: I owe my success to never making excuses or accepting excuses from others.
author: Florence Nightingale

text: The hardest thing is to start acting, everything else depends only on perseverance
author: Amelia Erhart

text: We must love life more than the meaning of life
author: Fedor Dostoevsky

text: Life is what happens to you while you're making plans
author: John Lennon

text: It is always worth starting with something that sows doubt
author: Boris Strugazky

text: Real responsibility is only personal.
author: Fazil Iskander

text: A meaningless life is not worth living
author: Socratus

text: 80% success is showing up in the right place at the right time
author: Woody Allen

text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life
author: Steve Jobs

text: Winning is not everything, everything is a constant desire to win
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Science is organized knowledge, wisdom is organized life
author: Emmanuil Kant

text: There is no word impossible in my dictionary
author: Bonapart

text: You will never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: Christopher Culumbus

text: Freedom is worth nothing unless it includes the freedom to make mistakes.
author: Ghandi

text: Either you control your day or the day controls you.
author: Jim Rohn

text: The best revenge is a huge success
author: Frank Sinatra

text: Fall down seven times and get up eight times
author: Japanese proverb

text: Everything has its beauty, but not everyone can see it
author: Konfuciy

text: How wonderful that you don't have to wait a single minute to start making the world a better place.
author: Ann Frank

text: When I release who I am, I become who I can be.
author: Lao Xi

text: Счастье – это не нечто готовое. Счастье зависит только от ваших действий
author: Dalay Lhama

text: If there is no wind, take the oars
author: Latin proverb

text: Success is the ability to go from defeat to defeat without losing optimism.
author: Winston Cherchill

text: Everyone wants to change humanity, but no one thinks about how to change themselves
author: Lev Tolstoj

text: It is important to believe that talent is given to us for a reason - and that at any cost it must be used for something.
author: Mary Cury

text: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement
author: Wilem Klement Stone
